alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 10:30AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CHARLOTTE AND NORTHWESTERN LEE COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM EST... At 1029 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pineland, or 14 miles west of Cape Coral, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Punta Gorda, Matlacha, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Palmona Park, Babcock Webb Wma, Charlotte County Airport, Pineland, Pine Island Center, Burnt Store Marina, Fort Myers Shores, North Fort Myers, Tropical Gulf Acres, Suncoast Estates, Harbour Heights, Charlotte Park, Cleveland, Bokeelia, Pirate Harbor, and Solana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
